text: Nova Venécia is an Brazilian municipality in the state of Espírito Santo. 50,434 people lived here in 2020 and its area is 1,448 km². It was founded in 1888 as Colônia de Santa Leocádia and later became called Colônia de Nova Venécia, which it takes its name from the Italian immigrants from Veneto. == Notable people == * Jussiê (born 1983), former football player * Richarlison (born 1997), football player (Tottenham Hotspur) == References == Category:1888 establishments in South America Category:19th-century establishments in Brazil Category:Municipalities in Espírito Santo
title: Nova Venécia
